Plot: The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.
Title: D3: The Mighty Ducks
Writer: Steven Brill (characters), Kenneth Johnson (story), Jim Burnstein (story), Steven Brill (screenplay), Jim Burnstein (screenplay)
Actors: Emilio Estevez, Jeffrey Nordling, David Selby, Heidi Kling
